original_text: And to them which were in Rachal, and to them which were in the cities of the Jerahmeelites, and to them which were in the cities of the Kenites,
korean_text: 라갈에 있는 자와 여라므엘 사람의 성읍들에 있는 자와 겐 사람의 성읍들에 있는 자와

sentences.original_text: And to them which were in Rachal
and to them which were in the cities of the Jerahmeelites
and to them which were in the cities of the Kenites
